name: Don't Worry Spain
description:
Don't Worry Spain want to create the future with their customers.
Internet and advances in digitalization as well as social networks are transforming the company.
Companies want to publicize and position their products and services, looking for the most appropriate profile of the consumer.
They manage to carry out these developments and reports.

Their portfolio of active clients is accounted for by 25% of multinationals and large companies located in the United Kingdom and Spain, mainly.
